summary: Marooned on an idyllic islet, the beautiful young woman, Ro, sees her world turn upside down, when an adventurous prince takes her and her furry friends to explore civilisation. Could Ro be Rosella, the missing Island Princess?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Melissa Lyons|Alessandro Juliani|Christopher Gaze|Steve Marvel|Susan Roman|Garry Chalk|Russell Roberts|Patricia Drake|Bets Malone|Britt McKillip|Carly McKillip|Chantal Strand|Andrea Martin|Candice Nicole|Kate Fisher|Brian Drummond|Terry Klassen|David Kaye|Kathleen Barr|Scott Page-Pagter|Ian James Corlett|Matt|Belinda
title: Barbie en La princesa de los animales
